long_description: The women-specific Mountain Hardwear Agami daypack easily shifts from weekend trails to weekday commutes thanks to its shaped back panel, stable suspension and thoughtfully-designed pockets. Lightweight and strong framesheet is shaped to match the curve of your back and shape of your waist so the load remains stable and well balanced; the pack won't round out. Women-specific shoulder straps and fully padded back panel feature fast-wicking air mesh and strategically placed venting channels to keep you cooler. Large main compartment features a multipurpose sleeve that fits a 15 in. laptop or a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Secondary pocket features a sleeve for a tablet plus 2 zippered security pockets (1 mesh, 1 fabric). Large front pocket with stretch mesh panels and side compression straps is perfect for stashing shoes, a bike helmet, jacket or other gear. Mountain Hardwear Agami daypack has a fleece-lined top zip pocket for quick access to sunglasses or phone. Tuck-away waistbelt; adjustable sternum strap; stretch side pockets; front and back grab handles.
short_description: The women-specific Mountain Hardwear Agami daypack easily shifts from weekend trails to weekday commutes thanks to its shaped back panel, stable suspension and thoughtfully-designed pockets.
